lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts did not get to enjoy their Super Bowl victory for long before things started going haywire. It will not matter. The Colts have always been adept at replacing what appeared to be key cogs. Remember what a disaster losing Edgerrin James was supposed to be last season? He looked on from Arizona as the Colts won the Super Bowl.
